abstract: Snapvine, a service that allows users to add and receive voice messages directly on their MySpace pages, has been growing like a weed since it started last summer, with more than 5 million installations on MySpace, Facebook, Bebo and other sites.
lead_paragraph: Snapvine, a service that allows users to add and receive voice messages directly on their MySpace pages, has been growing like a weed since it started last summer, with more than 5 million installations on MySpace, Facebook, Bebo and other sites.

headline.main: V.C.’s Leave $10 Million Message on Snapvine
